TEXT.TITLE: CHANTAL PHARMACEUTICAL <CHTL> SHARES TO BE SOLD
TEXT.BODY: Chantal Pharmaceutical Corp said a registration statement covering an offering of 1,943,850 of its common shares by shareholders has become effective. The registration includes 1,650,000 shares sold in a September 1986 private placement. Reuter
